= | manageryears1 = | managerclubs1 = | pcupdate = 00:00, 4 June 2012 (UTC) | ntupdate = }} {{spanish name 2|Enguix|Pachés}} '''Joaquín 'Ximo' Enguix Pachés''' (born 18 February 1978 in [[Tavernes de la Valldigna]], [[Valencian Community|Valencia]]) is a [[Spain|Spanish]] [[Association football|footballer]] who plays for Sociedad Deportiva Sueca as a [[Midfielder#Defensive|defensive midfielder]].
